General.Name: Shinfox Energy Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shinfox Energy Co., Ltd. invests in, develops, constructs, operates, and maintains renewable power plants in Taiwan. The company operates solar power, onshore and offshore wind power, liquefied natural gas (LPG), hydropower, etc. plants. It also provides LNG supply, green energy trading, ESCO energy saving, and energy storage device technology services. Shinfox Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Shinfox Energy Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Power Quotient International Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 49, Zhongyang Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 236040
